q_ch: 订单产品是T恤的裁剪任务有哪些？
q_en: Which cutting tasks are for products categorized as T-shirt?
gt:
Sure thing! Let's dive into the cutting tasks for products categorized as "T-shirt". Here's a neat table summarizing the details for you:

| Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status |
|---------|---------------------|---------------------|----------------|------------------|--------|
| 1       | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-01-18 00:00:00 | 100            | 100              | 2      |
| 2       | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-02-02 00:00:00 | 240            | 240              | 1      |
| 3       | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-01-19 00:00:00 | 150            | 150              | 2      |
| 4       | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-01-17 00:00:00 | 220            | 220              | 1      |
| 5       | 2024-01-10 00:00:00 | 2024-02-02 00:00:00 | 260            | 260              | 1      |

Each task is associated with a product categorized as a "T-shirt". The status column indicates the current state of each task, where 1 might represent "in progress" and 2 might represent "completed". If you need more details or have any other questions, feel free to ask! 😄

steps.sql: SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'T-shirt';
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs for products categorized as 'T-shirt'

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 11, 19, 27);
steps.description: Retrieve the order_product IDs for the products identified in Step1

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, ct.planned_number, ct.completed_number, ct.status FROM cutting_tasks ct WHERE ct.order_product_id IN (1, 35, 3, 4, 2, 5);
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting tasks for the order_product IDs identified in Step2
